name: The Black Beyond
description:
I'm extremely grateful for any feedback or publicity about my game.  My game is a work in progress, and I am very much dedicated to finishing it (you know...before I go broke and die). 

Your help is very much ... helpful? At a certain point I'm just sucking up, but seriously...thank you!  

Thank you very much for trying my game!

(Note: I'm in the process of updating my screenshots and videos to showcase the latest version as of 7/11/18!)
